new_feature_requests.summary: In frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, update the React import statement to include useState: import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
In frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, inside the useActor function right below the queryClient declaration, add a new state variable: const [telemetryActor, setTelemetryActor] = useState<any>(null);

In frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, update the return statement at the very bottom to return three properties: return { actor: actorQuery.data || null, telemetryActor, isFetching: actorQuery.isFetching };

projectName: Update useActor hook to prepare telemetry actor state
